duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the primary point of contact for all retail members, educating and cross-selling LMCU products and services.
Set up new accounts and consumer loans, and prioritize member needs.
Open and process new accounts, savings products, loans, and other financial products with accuracy.
Counsel members on financial responsibility and credit to create a safe financial future.
Build relationships with business partners and successfully refer products to them.
Mentor peers and coach them to find successful referrals.
Represent LMCU within the community and at various sponsored events.

education_certification.credential: One to three years of similar or related experience.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
